description: This Java source file defines the class MockLegacyDoorWindowSensor, which is a mock implementation of a door/window sensor device for testing purposes. It extends MockLegacySecurityDevice and implements MockSensor, providing methods to simulate sensor behaviors such as faulting, tampering, battery issues, and temperature measurements.

classes.name: MockLegacyDoorWindowSensor
classes.description: A mock class simulating a legacy door/window sensor device with various state-manipulation methods for testing.

methods.name: fault
methods.description: Marks the sensor cluster as faulted, with console output indicating the change.

methods.name: restore
methods.description: Restores the sensor cluster from faulted state, with console output.

methods.name: faultToggle
methods.description: Toggles the faulted state of the sensor cluster.

methods.name: tamper
methods.description: Simulates tampering of the sensor cluster.

methods.name: restoreTamper
methods.description: Restores the tampered state of the sensor cluster.
